attributes.action: relax the regulations under which Royal Mail must operate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are writing to you, as the major shareholder, to help us keep Royal Mail alive.
The legislation within which RM must operate is strangling it. They can't keep their customers, nor win new ones. Their competitors can undercut RMs' prices because they can charge what they want while RM must charge what the regulator tells them to.
Mr Blair, we are asking you, both as PM and as the senior shareholder, to release RM from the restrictive working practises being forced upon it, so that they can fight on a level playing field with their competitors. 
Without your assistance, we can see this great British establishment being run into the ground and sold off for scrap.
Please help the loyal, hard working Postmen and Women of RM keep their jobs and futures safe.
Signed,
The concerned members of postmanchat.com, customers and employees of Royal Mail.
